AFL pundits last year salivated over the prospect of the injury-prone yet talented Essendon forward moving to Sydney and teaming up with Lance Franklin for a few y… [+11415 chars]

articles.title: Sun Yang abandoned by China fans, Mack Horton gets apology - Fox Sports
articles.description: Disgraced swimmer Sun Yang’s house of cards is crashing down around him with the Olympic champion facing a backlash from his most loyal supporters as he prepares for his desperate final appeal.
articles.content:
The 28-year-old last month submitted an appeal over his eight-year doping ban to Switzerlands highest court after the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) earlier this year slapped him with one of the heaviest punishments ever handed out in sport.
Unless he … [+4787 chars]
